Well, the king doesn't send troops anymore, the academy is dreadfully low on money, and the end of the world is pretty nigh. Apart from that I am reasonably fine, I suppose.
I sell the Key to Adventure for 5 gold! If you are interested, tell me that you want to buy the key.
I am the master of this fine academy.
Our academy has a library, a training center in the cellars and the oracle upstairs.
Go and read our books. Ignorance may mean death, so be careful.
You can try some basic things down there, but don't challenge the monsters in our arena if you are inexperienced.

Here on Rookgaard we have some people, a temple, some shops, a farm and an academy.
My name is Seymour, but to you I am 'Sir' Seymour.

At least you know how to address a man of my importance.
I can assist you with my advice.

Well, there's me, Cipfried, Willie, Obi, Amber, Dallheim, Al Dee, Norma, and Hyacinth.
Read the blackboard for some hints and visit the training center in the cellar.
You can learn about Tibia's monsters in our library.
Our sewers are overrun with rats. If you own some equipment you could go down a sewer grate and fight the vermin.
You can learn much about Tibia's gods in our library.
If you have serious problems with the game or with other people who are harassing you, contact a counsellor or a gamemaster using CTRL+R.

Hail to King Tibianus! Long live our king! Not that he cares for an old veteran who is stuck on this godforsaken island...
A cousin of Thais' smith Sam. He has a shop here where you can buy most stuff an adventurer needs.
A humble monk with healing powers, and a pupil of the great Quentin himself.
A traveller from the main land. I wonder what brought her here, since no one comes here of his own free will.
Willie is a fine farmer, although he has short temper.
A mysterious druid who lives somewhere in the wilderness. He sells precious life fluids.
Oh good Dallheim! What a fighter he is! Without him we would be doomed.
He is a shop owner in the northwestern part of the village.
He is responsible for the temple in Thais.
A rare magic potion that restores health.
Nasty little creatures, but once you have a suitable weapon and perhaps a shield they will be no match for you.
You need fine weapons to fight the tougher beasts. Unfortunately only the most basic weapons and armor are available here. You will have to fight some monsters to get a better weapon.
The only magic-user on this isle is old Hyacinth.

Oh, how I miss the crowded streets of Thais. I know one day I will get promoted and get a job at the castle... I must get out of here! The faster the better! It is people like you who are driving me mad.
The castle of Thais is the greatest achievement in Tibian history.
